text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for the EC2 APIs and new instance launches in the US-GOV-EAST-1 Region. Existing instances are unaffected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for the EC2 APIs and new instance launches in the US-GOV-EAST-1 Region. Existing instances are unaffected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We can confirm increased error rates for the CreateVolume and CreateSnapshot EBS APIs in the US-GOV-EAST-1 Region. This may impact the launching of new EBS backed EC2 instances. Existing instances are unaffected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 7:07 PM and 8:47 PM PDT we experienced increased error rates for the CreateVolume and CreateSnapshot EBS APIs in the US-GOV-EAST-1 Region, which also impacted the launching of new EBS backed EC2 instances. Existing instances were unaffected. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
